summary.span: 处理 XML 架构中的元素和特性名称，还可以选择验证 XML 架构。

span.span: Processes the element and attribute names in the XML schemas and, optionally, validates the XML schemas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下列表标识了在其中的情况下调用方法：The following list identifies situations in which the method is called: - 通过类在创建时从作为 Web 服务标识的类的对象。By the class while creating objects from classes that are identified as Web services. - 由 Wsdl.exe 工具或类，而从 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档生成客户端代理类或抽象的服务器类。By the Wsdl.exe tool or the class, while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. - 通过从在程序集中找到的类型生成 XML 架构时的 Xsd.exe 工具。By the Xsd.exe tool while generating XML schemas from types found in assemblies. 而不是调用方法直接，使用前面所述的类或工具。Instead of calling the method directly, use the previously mentioned classes or tools.
